revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Network Attached Storage Enclosure with Blu-Ray ReWriter |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.lg.com/uk/network-storage/lg-N2B1D-network-attached-storage |sp = https://www.lg.com/us/support-product/lg-N2B1DB2#softwareFirmware |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = LG |model = N2B1D |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6192; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v5 |cpu1_type_rev = Feroceon core |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 600 / 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;NAND01GW3B2CN6; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5PS1G1631C-FP-S6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:E0:91
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;NC1; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36.2-lgnas;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, eSATA, SD/SDHC/MMC Card slot |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 3 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 4.74 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LCD display, Blu-ray drive, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = SATA 4-Port Multiplier;Marvell;88SM4140;;1;,,, 8-bit Single-Chip Microcontroller;NEC; D78F0535;;1;,,, 4 Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;NEC;μPD720114;;1;,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor With I2C and SMBus Interface;TI;TMP75;;1;,,, Dual 2-Phase Synchronous Step-Down Controller;Linear Technology;LTC3858;;1;,,, 30V, 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6682;;2;,,, 30V, 14.5A N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild;FDS6676AS;;2;,,, 4.5V-5.5V, 2A Synchronous Buck Converter;Rohm;BD9111;;1;,,, 2.7V-5.5V, 2A Synchronous Buck Converter;Rohm;BD9130;;1;,,, Step-Down Switching Regulator;Rohm;BD9132MUV;;1;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;TI;SN74LVC244A;;1;,,, Quad Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2044;;1;;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2009 |estprice = 329 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0039BPFSY |asin_country = UK |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Internal SATA Ports occupied by a Blu-Ray disk rewriter and two 1TB Hitachi-LG Disks.
==Links of Interest== [http://gscs-b2c.lge.com/downloadFile?fileId=KROWM000265585.pdf User Guide] {{•}} [http://opensource.lge.com/images/front/ico-source-code.png GPL Firmware Source]
